title: 每次登陆都会出现，该怎么去掉？
author: 神哥丿
txt_content:
每次登陆都会出现，该怎么去掉？

replies.author: mliy
replies.txt_content: 提示: 该帖被管理员或版主屏蔽

replies.author: Yexiaolu
replies.txt_content: 出现什么？  这怎么回答？

replies.author: lovechina
replies.txt_content:
在authme文件夹的
welcome.txt里面修改

replies.author: Pony_LuLu
replies.txt_content: 提示: 作者被禁止或删除 内容自动屏蔽

replies.author: Lss233
replies.txt_content: AutMe登录插件语言文件损坏，解决方法：删除message_zh.yml、message_en.yml然后重启服务器。
